name: get_artist_albums
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_music_api_detailed.
Tool description: Detailed Youtube Music API. Lyrics, Trends, Albums, Artists, Songs, Users, Playlists, Songs etc.
API description: Get information about an artist and their top releases (songs, albums, singles, videos, and related artists). The top lists contain pointers for getting the full list of releases

channel_id.description: The unique identifier for the artist's channel.

params.description: Parameters required to fetch artist details, typically obtained from the `get_artist` function.
